docs.text: MkDocs Demo ¶ This repo provides an example of a MkDocs website using the Material for MkDocs theme. Details are included for hosting the website as a Github Project, User or Organization. Helpful Links MkDocs Material for MkDocs Markdown Cheatsheet Github User, Organization, and Project Pages MkDocs Demo Github Repo
docs.title: Home

docs.text: This repo provides an example of a MkDocs website using the Material for MkDocs theme. Details are included for hosting the website as a Github Project, User or Organization. Helpful Links MkDocs Material for MkDocs Markdown Cheatsheet Github User, Organization, and Project Pages MkDocs Demo Github Repo
docs.title: MkDocs Demo

docs.text: MkDocs Commands ¶ mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server mkdocs build - Build the documentation site mkdocs help - Print this help message The Makefile in this repo provides make targets for these comands.
docs.title: Commands

docs.text: mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server mkdocs build - Build the documentation site mkdocs help - Print this help message The Makefile in this repo provides make targets for these comands.
docs.title: MkDocs Commands

docs.text: Custom Domain Names ¶ CNAME file ¶ The CNAME file contains the custom domain name, e.g., www.mkdocs-demo.org Do not include a CNAME file in the repo if you are not using a custom domain name, i.e., you are using the default URL Github Info on Apex Domains Setting up an apex domain Setting up an apex domain and www subdomain What is a DNS Resource Record? About Resource Records Github Project Custom Domain Name DNS Configuration ¶ Create the required A (IPv4 address) records as described here Create a CNAME (canonical name) record for the www name and assign it the domain name of the project Github User Custom Domain Name DNS Configuration ¶ Create the required A (IPv4 address) records as described here Create a CNAME (canonical name) record for the www name and assign it the domain name of the user Github Organization Custom Domain Name DNS Configuration ¶ Create the required A (IPv4 address) records as described here Create a CNAME (canonical name) record for the www name and assign it the domain name of the organization Problems? Github's tips for troubleshooting custom domains
docs.title: Custom Domain Names

docs.text: The CNAME file contains the custom domain name, e.g., www.mkdocs-demo.org Do not include a CNAME file in the repo if you are not using a custom domain name, i.e., you are using the default URL Github Info on Apex Domains Setting up an apex domain Setting up an apex domain and www subdomain What is a DNS Resource Record? About Resource Records
docs.title: CNAME file

docs.text: Create the required A (IPv4 address) records as described here Create a CNAME (canonical name) record for the www name and assign it the domain name of the project
docs.title: Github Project Custom Domain Name DNS Configuration

docs.title: Github Organization Custom Domain Name DNS Configuration

docs.text: Github User and Organization Websites ¶ User and Organization websites are described here User and Organization Details MkDocs content is kept in org-name-mkdocs repo Website Deployment ¶ The site is built with: cd ../org-name.github.io; mkdocs gh-deploy --config-file ../org-name-mkdocs/mkdocs.yml --remote-branch master The site content is pushed to the org-name.github.io repo's master branch The Makefile in this repo as a target for building the site MkDocs Description Deploying Organization and User Pages Default URL ¶ The default URL for a Project website is: https://org-name.github.io/org-name.github.io , e.g., https://athenian-robotics.github.io/athenian-robotics.github.io/
docs.title: Organization

docs.text: User and Organization websites are described here User and Organization Details MkDocs content is kept in org-name-mkdocs repo
docs.title: Github User and Organization Websites

docs.text: The site is built with: cd ../org-name.github.io; mkdocs gh-deploy --config-file ../org-name-mkdocs/mkdocs.yml --remote-branch master The site content is pushed to the org-name.github.io repo's master branch The Makefile in this repo as a target for building the site MkDocs Description Deploying Organization and User Pages
docs.title: Website Deployment

docs.text: The default URL for a Project website is: https://org-name.github.io/org-name.github.io , e.g., https://athenian-robotics.github.io/athenian-robotics.github.io/
docs.title: Default URL

docs.text: Github Project Websites ¶ Project websites are described here . Project Details An empty .nojekyll file is required in the root Website Deployment ¶ The site is built with: mkdocs gh-deploy The site's content is pushed to the Project repo's gh_pages branch The Makefile in this repo as a target for building the site MkDocs Description Deploying Project Pages Default URL ¶ The default URL for a Project website is: https://project-name.github.io/project-name , e.g., https://athenian-programming.github.io/mkdocs-demo/
docs.title: Project

docs.text: Project websites are described here . Project Details An empty .nojekyll file is required in the root
docs.title: Github Project Websites

docs.text: The site is built with: mkdocs gh-deploy The site's content is pushed to the Project repo's gh_pages branch The Makefile in this repo as a target for building the site MkDocs Description Deploying Project Pages
docs.title: Website Deployment

docs.text: The default URL for a Project website is: https://project-name.github.io/project-name , e.g., https://athenian-programming.github.io/mkdocs-demo/
docs.title: Default URL

docs.text: MkDocs Setup ¶ MkDocs Project Layout ¶ mkdocs.yml # Configuration file .gitignore # exclude site/ docs/ CNAME # Optional custom domain name assets/images/favicon.ico # favicon file images/owls.png # logo file index.md # Website homepage ... # Markdown pages, images and other files site/ # Generated website (not included in repo)
docs.title: Setup

docs.text: mkdocs.yml # Configuration file .gitignore # exclude site/ docs/ CNAME # Optional custom domain name assets/images/favicon.ico # favicon file images/owls.png # logo file index.md # Website homepage ... # Markdown pages, images and other files site/ # Generated website (not included in repo)
docs.title: MkDocs Project Layout
